categories: Category:Roche Hive Mechanical Apparatus Design and Construction Activity for Those Who Need the Hive's Machines products

nodes.text: The Ice Cat was a model of swoop produced by Roche Hive Mechanical Apparatus Design and Construction Activity for Those Who Need the Hive's Machines during the period of galactic history when the Eternal Empire was the primary galactic power.

The Roche Ice Cat was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Knights of the Fallen Empire Digital Expansion. It is one of the potential rewards in Alliance Supply Crates.
